doc.title: Daughter
doc.plot: You just woke up from an unspeakable nightmare. How does it feel? Relief? How would you feel if when you woke, the nightmare had just begun? Shae Powell, a successful single mom, wakes up rattled from a horrible dream. A dream woven in blood. Shaken, Shae goes to check on her young daughter, Sophie. Everything appears to be in order. Shae is about to return to bed when she hears water running in the bathroom. She can't get in there because te door is locked. Shae should pray that it stays locked.
